metadata.description: Sectoral energy services timeseries (2004-2024) with fossil/clean breakdown
sources: Historical efficiency factors and clean energy adoption rates
metadata.notes: Fossil intensities adjusted historically to reflect clean energy adoption. Sub-sector shares assumed constant (2024 calibrated) with sector-level growth rates applied.
